scripts.yarn: echo '#### yarn.lock has changed!'; $NVM_BIN/yarn; cd functions; $NVM_BIN/yarn; cd ..
scripts.serve-r: cd ../scvo-router; npm run build; npm link; cd ../scvo-frontend; npm link scvo-router; cd functions; npm link scvo-router; cd ..; npm run serve
scripts.serve: cd ./functions && npm run build && cd ../ && npm run build-dev && devmode=true firebase serve -p 9000 --only functions,hosting
scripts.serve-f: cd ./functions && npm run build && cd ../ && devmode=true firebase serve -p 9000 --only functions
scripts.deploy: cd ./functions && npm run build && npm run deploy-db && cd ../ && npm run build-prod && firebase deploy --only functions,hosting
scripts.deploy-h: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy-f: cd ./functions && npm run build && cd ../ && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.postmerge: git diff-tree -r --name-only --no-commit-id ORIG_HEAD HEAD | grep --quiet 'yarn.lock' && eval 'npm run yarn'
